line_1: Some fly thee, some torment, and some seduce;
line_2: The creatures now withdraw their kindly use,

line_1: Glitt'ring in vain, or only to seduce,
line_2: Woe to the man whose wit disclaims its use,

line_1: No shew of parts the truly wise seduce,
line_2: To think that knaves can be of real use.
